meanings.definition: A person who is obsessed with a single idea or subject.
meanings.sent1: Some monomaniacs spend all their time thinking about one thing.
meanings.sent2: The group of monomaniacs discussed their favorite topic for hours.
meanings.sent3: The monomaniacs at the convention argued passionately about their chosen topic.
meanings.sent4: Her brother was a monomaniac when it came to collecting stamps.
meanings.sent5: The monomaniacs' dedication to their cause was truly remarkable.

meanings.sent1: The monomaniacs gathered for their weekly meeting.
meanings.sent2: In the library, you could hear the whispers of the monomaniacs.
meanings.sent3: The monomaniacs' collection of rare books was the envy of all.
meanings.sent4: The monomaniacs' passion for their hobby knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The monomaniacs' enthusiasm was infectious to all around them.
